issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;

### Problem description

### Steps:
1. Check if the site is existing
2. If the site is dead - remove all rules for this site
3. If working - check for applied `[-ext-` rules and remove unused rules or convert to the actual syntax, if a rule applied.

This task is only about extcss, so the detailed check is optional (you can create a separate list with missed ads and process it in another task).

comment.body:
So has anyone heard any updates on if uBlock Origin is going to add the AdGuard Tracking Protection list back among the default lists available?

The longer this goes on, the worse it looks for AdGuard, in my opinion, some will assume that your list has problems & will avoid it; even if the decision to remove it & not add it back once this was fixed was a bit extreme.
